abstracts.cdata!:
The project would be carried out from
            1977-1981 and cover part of the Government's 10-year
            investment plan. It would consist of improvements and
            extensions of existing and construction of new water supply
            systems in secondary centers of the Ivory Coast; consulting
            services for construction supervision, to carry out
            feasibility studies for centers to be selected during
            project implementation and to update and extend the
            government's Water Sector Development Program; and training.
